summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Stevens Street, from 45th Avenue Southwest to 50th Avenue Southwest; West Lander Street from California Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest, West Wait Street, from 44th Avenue Southwest to 47th Avenue Southwest, 44th Avenue Southwest, from West College Street to West Hanford Street; 46th Avenue Southwest and 47th Avenue Southwest, each from West Walker Street to West Stevens Street; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and the necessary wooden crosswalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2241 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
